div.p: We thank L. Cole for the caterpillar half‚Äêfall data and the many fieldworkers who collected data during the breeding season for the Wytham study. This work was funded by a NERC grant NE/K006274/1 awarded to BCS. BCS is a Wolfson Research Merit Award holder. The MOD09Q1 and MYD09Q1 data products are courtesy of the online Data Pool at the NASA Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center (LP DAAC), USGS/Earth Resources Observation and Science (EROS) Center, Sioux Falls, South Dakota. We thank Mike Langman for use of the RSPB great tit and blue tit images used in our figures.
